inputs.selection_motivation: Higher JGB yields attract carry‑trade inflows, strengthening the JPY and pushing USD/JPY lower, making JGB yield a direct driver of the USD/JPY pair.
inputs.candidate_motivation: Japan 10Y JGB Yield is tightly coupled to global sovereign yields, central‑bank policy, and currency dynamics; the most direct influences and peers are other major 10Y yields, policy decisions, inflation measures, and the USD/JPY and DXY that reflect the currency link.

proposed_link.motivation: Higher JGB yields attract carry‑trade inflows, strengthening the JPY and pushing USD/JPY lower, making JGB yield a direct driver of the USD/JPY pair.
